sentences.en: a threat to burn the president in effigy
sentences.cn: 威胁要焚烧总统模拟像

sentences.en: British an effigy of Guy Fawkes that is burned on a bonfire on Guy Fawkes Day.
sentences.cn: 盖伊·福克斯日在营火里焚烧的盖伊·福克斯的塑像.
焚烧某人的肖像以泄恨.

sentences.en: During the war, the president was sometimes burned in effigy in some cities.
sentences.cn: 在战争期间, 一些城市有时焚烧总统的模拟像.

sentences.en: He stated that the charity was actually initiated by two sisters named Preston and that the effigy on the cake was that of two poor widows.
sentences.cn: 他认为该慈善活动最初是由普列斯顿两姐妹发起的，糕饼上的肖像则是两位贫穷的寡妇。

sentences.en: He was modelling for the stone effigy which in the fullness of time would adorn his tomb.
sentences.cn: 他正在塑造一幅到时候会用来装饰他自己坟墓的碑石肖像。

sentences.en: In Paraguay, people create an effigy and dress him up like a scarecrow when the new year comes.
sentences.cn: 每逢新年来临，巴拉圭人都会专门制作雕像，然后把雕像打扮成稻草人的样子。

sentences.en: Protesters set fire to government building and burned his likeness in effigy.
sentences.cn: 抗议者点燃了政府大楼和卡扎菲的肖像。

sentences.en: The coin bears an effigy of lincoln.
sentences.cn: 那枚硬币镌有林肯的肖像.

sentences.en: The deposed dictator was burned in effigy by the crowd.
sentences.cn: 群众焚烧退位独裁者的模拟像

sentences.en: The king was burned in effigy by the angry mob.
sentences.cn: 国王的模拟像被愤怒的民众烧掉以泄心中的愤恨.

sentences.en: There the effigy stands, and stares from age to age across the changing ocean.
sentences.cn: 雕像依然耸立在那儿, 千秋万载地凝视着那变幻无常的大海.

sentences.en: They burn him in effigy to away the gloom and bring in a new , better year.
sentences.cn: 他们焚烧忧郁老人来驱赶忧郁及带来更好的来年.

sentences.en: This effigy is decorated with old newspapers and firecrackers.
sentences.cn: 通常,人们用旧报纸和爆竹装扮稻草人.

sentences.en: To get rid of these bad things, every family lights an effigy on fire at midnight.
sentences.cn: 为了彻底告别这些不好的东西, 每个家庭都会在午夜时分点火烧掉稻草人.

phrases.tran_cn: 模拟像：象征性的，特别是以模拟像的形式
